'''Molten Fissures''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]]. They function like [[Phase Gate]]s, and can be entered using the [[Tepetlisaurus]] and [[Children of Echoes]] abilities and by [[Mavuika]]. Travel can be ended prematurely by tapping the [[Jump]] button.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Molten Fissures}}

==Trivia==
* The appearance of a Molten Fissure changes when the active character is a Children of Echoes character, Mavuika, or indwelling a Tepetlisaur &mdash; it becomes brighter and more vibrant.
